name: Fuuka
description: Requires max courage in order to start this social link. First available on June 19th, afterwards on Monday, Friday, Saturday. She's located next to the stairs leading to the main hallway.
ranks: Rank 3: Say "I believe in you" > Anything
Rank 4: Say anything > Oh, I don't think so
Rank 5: Say "You did a great job" > Anything
Rank 8: Say anything > I want to be with you too
unlocks: For maxing out Fuuka's social link you're able to fuse Scathach through normal or triangle fusion
